{{Lang|'''Ilyin'''|ru=Ильин|ru_rm=Il'in}} is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the {{Quest|Where the Dandelions Find Rest}}. Although he has the appearance of a [[Fatui Skirmisher - Pyroslinger Bracer]], he turns into the appearance of a [[Fatui Pyro Agent]] when fighting.
